info.name: File Labels
info.description:
A primitive for attaching user-specific key-value labels to files. Designed as a foundation for other apps to build on.
Key features: - User-specific labels (each user manages their own labels independently) - Key-value pairs for flexible metadata (category=work, priority=high) - WebDAV integration for desktop/mobile client sync - OCS REST API for programmatic access - Event bus for inter-app communication - Sidebar tab in Files app for label management
Example use cases: - Personal organization (project=work, status=todo) - Ratings and reviews - Custom workflows - Building other apps that need file metadata
info.author: Jeff Welling
